remarks: One of the equations showing ` CH ` is an ortholattice.  (This corresponds to axiom "ax-3" in the Quantum Logic Explorer.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Aug-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
qlax.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
qlax.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
qlax.3 $e |- C e. CH $.
qlax3i $p |- ( ( A vH B ) vH C ) = ( A vH ( B vH C ) ) $.
